DOCUMENT 150
ELECTRONICALLY FILED
2/13/2025 8:19 AM
70-DR-2023-900051.01
CIRCUIT COURT OF
TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
PATRICK CRADDOCK, CLERK
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
AT ALEXANDER CITY
CHRISTOPHER BLAINE MCGREGOR )
PLAINTIFF/RESPONDENT )
VS. ) CASE NO. DR-2023-900051.01
BRITTANY MICHELLE GILLILAND )
DEFENDANT/PETITIONER )
MOTION TO STRIKE
Comes now the Plaintiff/Respondent, Christopher Blaine McGregor, by and through his
attorney, Dianne James Davis, and files this Motion to Strike the AFFIDAVIT OF KELLY
TURNER and states as follows:
1. That the above styled case in on this Court’s docket on February 13, 2025, on several
pending motions;
2. That at 5:46 pm on February 12, 2025, Counsel for the Defendant/Petitioner filed the
Affidavit of Kelly Turner (who was to do the reunification therapy);
3. That after two (2) sessions with the Mother and Minor Child, Kelly Turner prepared
this “Affidavit” which was full of hearsay and a finding against the father;
4. That Kelly Turner obtained the history of the patient and the case strictly from the
Mother and to the Father’s knowledge, without any independent verification of the
truth of the facts.
5. That facts provided by the Mother could have been verified through the child’s
school, DHR, or the child’s primary physician.
6. That to make a blanket statement as done in this “Affidavit” borders on violation of
the standard of care for her profession.
WHEREFORE the premises considered, the Plaintiff/Respondent requests this “Affidavit
Kelly Turner be stricken until her deposition can be taken.
Respectfully submitted this the 13th day of February, 2025.
DOCUMENT 150
/s/Dianne James Davis
Dianne James Davis (DAV007)
Attorney for Plaintiff/Father
107 Main Street
Alexander City, Alabama 35010
(256) 392-3172
(256) 392-3578 (Facsimile)
dianne@diannedavislaw.com

I hereby certify that I have served a copy of the foregoing upon the following via
electronic filing in the AlaCourt E-File System and/or by placing a copy of same, properly
addressed and postage paid in the U.S. Mail on this the 13th day of February, 2025.
Barbara H. Agricola
127 South 8th Street
Opelika, AL 36801
/s/Dianne James Davis
Of Counsel
